quote_last: that afternoon in late January when I stepped into the parlour with Boo, my dog, Hutch was in his favourite armchair, scowling at the television, which he had muted.
title: Odd Hours
author: Dean Koontz

quote_first: She hung up on me at first, then asked me whether I made a point of behaving like a 'small-time suburban punk' with women I had slept with.
